metadata.Title: CVE-2016-4428 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in OpenStack Dashboard (Horizon)8.0.1 and earlier and 9.0.0 through 9.0.1 allows remote authenticated usersto inject arbitrary web script or HTML by injecting an AngularJS templatein a dashboard form.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-4428` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

openstack-dashboard - 1:2014.1.5-0ubuntu2.1
openstack-dashboard-ubuntu-theme - 1:2014.1.5-0ubuntu2.1
python-django-horizon - 1:2014.1.5-0ubuntu2.1
python-django-openstack - 1:2014.1.5-0ubuntu2.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: horizon package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:2014.1.5-0ubuntu2.1').
